EmailTemplate.subject: 15% OFF Tech? Oh My!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/Account/Logon?cmp=EBBSSEPTEMBER192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Get 15% OFF** your purchase of $150 or more.
Use code 1909SAVE at checkout. <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/Account/Logon?cmp=EBBSSEPTEMBER192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
Unlock your tech savings now! Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/Account/Logon?cmp=EBBSSEPTEMBER192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Computer Accessories Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/Computer-Accessories/_/N-asr?cmp=EBBSSEPTEMBER192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Storage & Memory Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/Storage-Memory/_/N-8yb?cmp=EBBSSEPTEMBER192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Office & Mobile Phones, Headsets & Accessories Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/Office-Mobile-Phones-Headsets-Accessories/_/N-dqr?cmp=EBBSSEPTEMBER192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Save on 1000s of products every day. Office supplies Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Office-Supplies/_/N-af2?cmp=EBBSSEPTEMBER192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Technology Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Technology/_/N-86f?cmp=EBBSSEPTEMBER192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Facilities Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Cleaning-Maintenance/_/N-dxp?cmp=EBBSSEPTEMBER192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Furniture Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Furniture/_/N-acq?cmp=EBBSSEPTEMBER192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/_/N-1z0czra?cmp=EBBSSEPTEMBER192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT17EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
**Must sign in to your account in order to use the promo code. Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only. Enter promo code 1909SAVE at checkout. Not valid on copy paper, bottled water, ink&toner, services, printing, hardware, software or special orders. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only. Cash value .001¢. Offer expires September 30, 2019.
